doc.title: Josie & Jack
doc.plot: In a rural town, oppressed 16-year-old Josie is beautiful, brilliant and completely socially inept. When Josie and her charming, manipulative brother Jack decide to permanently escape their abusive father's wrath, they spiral into a world of sex and drugs in the big city hierarchy social scene. On her inadvertent path to self-awareness, will Josie ever escape from her brother's destructive path, and if so, how?
